home.name: Carlos
home.description:
Since 2018 I've been working as a Python developer.


With a background in Physics and a passion for building clean, scalable solutions, I've worked on projects ranging from web applications to automation scripts (among others).


I enjoy tackling complex problems and delivering efficient, maintainable code.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm a Python developer with a strong foundation in Physics, problem-solving, and software architecture. I specialize in Backend development. I've built APIs, data processing pipelines, and automation tools, working with frameworks like FastAPI, Flask and Django.


My experience spans freelance projects, personal applications, and collaborative development. I enjoy learning new technologies — from modern frontend tools like React to infrastructure-as-code with Terraform — and I'm always exploring ways to improve my craft.


Outside of coding, I love chess, reading, movies, music, and more.

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: Company specialized in media. I worked on migrating code from Flask to FastAPI, improving performance. I transformed a REST-based API into GraphQL using Strawberry, optimized communication with the frontend, managed data synchronization in BigQuery, implemented monitoring and logging in GCP, and provided technical support and collaboration with the frontend team.

experience.title: Backend Developer & DevOps Engineer
experience.description: I developed an API for a Content Management System (CMS) that uses AI to analyze PDF documents. I implemented FastAPI with PostgreSQL for scalability, integrated AWS S3 for file storage, deployed the application on EC2, and used pgvector for content-based searches.

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: I developed a REST API in FastAPI for a content search app based on proximity to the user. I implemented FastAPI with Prisma ORM and used the H3 library to efficiently calculate distances.

experience.title: MATLAB Developer
experience.description: I developed the MATLAB implementation of the Plotly library (Python). My main task on this project was to build a MATLAB solution from scratch, implementing different functionalities and examples.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: I worked as a web developer for New Iron, a furniture company. My work consisted of the complete process, from design, through implementation and publishing the site online.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: I worked on various Python-related projects for clients worldwide. My work included backend API development with FastAPI, Flask, and Django; data science tasks using libraries like Numpy, Pandas, and Seaborn; scraping and data collection with BeautifulSoup, Selenium, and Scrapy; and machine learning projects using scikit-learn, Keras, and TensorFlow.

education.description: I've studied Physics at the University of Buenos Aires, where I learned about the fundamental principles of the universe and how to apply them to real-world problems.

certifications.name: The Complete SQL Bootcamp
certifications.description: Comprehensive training in SQL fundamentals, including querying, joins, aggregations, window functions, and database design using PostgreSQL.

certifications.name: Git and Github
certifications.description: Practical course covering version control workflows, branching strategies, pull requests, and collaboration using Git and GitHub.

certifications.name: Terraform
certifications.description: Hands-on introduction to Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, covering resource provisioning, state management, and modular configurations on cloud providers.

certifications.name: GraphQL with Python
certifications.description: Focused on building GraphQL APIs with Python, including schema design, queries, mutations, subscriptions, and integration with databases.

certifications.name: Concurrent and Parallel Programming in Python
certifications.description: In-depth training on Python concurrency using threading, multiprocessing, and async/await to build efficient and scalable applications.

certifications.name: Microservices Architecture
certifications.description: Covers microservices principles, communication patterns, service deployment, and containerization, with a focus on building distributed systems.

skillsList.name: Python
skillsList.description: Extensive experience building backend services, APIs, automation tools, and data processing pipelines using Python and its ecosystem.

skillsList.name: Databases
skillsList.description: Proficient in relational database design, querying, optimization, and ORM integration, mainly with PostgreSQL.

skillsList.name: JavaScript
skillsList.description: Experience building interactive frontends and integrating APIs, with a focus on modern ES6+ features.

skillsList.name: React
skillsList.description: Skilled in creating responsive and component-based user interfaces, with state management and API-driven frontends.

skillsList.name: Docker
skillsList.description: Experienced in containerizing applications, managing development environments, and deploying services using Docker.

skillsList.name: AWS
skillsList.description: Hands-on experience deploying and managing applications in AWS, including EC2, RDS, S3, and IAM configurations.

skillsList.name: Terraform
skillsList.description: Practical knowledge of Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, automating cloud resource provisioning and configuration.

skillsList.name: Git
skillsList.description: Proficient with version control workflows, branching strategies, and collaborative development using Git and GitHub.

projectList.title: E-commerce API
projectList.description: A high-performance RESTful API for e-commerce applications built with FastAPI

projectList.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
projectList.description: Web application for visualizing and analyzing large datasets

projectList.title: Content Management System
projectList.description: Full featured CMS with admin panel and user management
